description:
Replace single-use propane bottles with this refillable, no-waste solution. The Gas Growler holds 5L of propane so you can cook or stay warm in the outdoors without creating trash. The sleeve insulates the tank for fuel efficiency in cold conditions.

  • Holds equivalent of 5 disposable bottles
  • Padded sleeve has handles and webbing straps for accessories
  • Includes 1.2m hose that fits most propane-burning devices
name: Ignik Gas Growler Deluxe
